citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:25pm on
05-Jun-17.
Inspector called licensee left a message. Licensee contacted inspector stating not available for an inspection due to
personal reasons.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

05-Jun-17.
Inspector called licensee left a message. Licensee contacted inspector stating not available for an inspection due to
personal reasons.
